sn23.14:1.2: Seated to one side, Venerable Radha said to the Buddha:
sn23.14:1.3: “Sir, they speak of this thing called ‘liable to impermanence’.
sn23.14:1.5: “Radha, form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are liable to impermanence.
sn23.14:1.7: They understand: ‘… there is nothing further for this place.’”
